Summary: My daughter called me at 8:30pm to tell me that she and her friend had been watching a reddish orange light hovering in the sky. We both have seen these lights in our town together and separately. I came to pick her up and saw another one myself .
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter called me from a baseball field to tell me that her and her friend had been watching these reddish orange lights hover and fly over them. They made no noise and pulsed. They traveled in different directions and hovered in the wind. I came to pick her up at her friend's house after talking to her and we saw another one. These craft have been very frequently sighted in our town by many people.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach
There were no other sightings in Indian Harbour Beach on or around March 23rd 2013
